titles.title: Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require individuals to provide their Social Security number in order to claim the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Refundable Child Tax Credit Eligibility Verification Reform Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require taxpayers to provide their social security number on their tax return in order to claim the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
